definition: center or bull's eye of an archery target (old)/goal/target
lit. can the sparrow and swallow know the will of the great swan? (idiom)/fig. how can we small fry predict the ambitions of the great?

definition: lit. can the sparrow and swallow know the will of the great swan? (idiom); fig. how can we small fry predict the ambitions of the great?
pinyin: yan4 que4 yan1 zhi1 hong2 gu3 zhi1 zhi4

sentences.english: Give up little minds of swallows, and hold high aspirations of swans .
sentences.chinese: 弃燕雀之小志，慕鸿鹄而高翔。

sentences.english: Jiangsu nanjing hh conveyer belt products co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 江苏南京鸿鹄输送带制品有限公司。

sentences.english: Thought of the verse, image of the swan immortal bird becomes after the induction change.
sentences.chinese: 诗句之意念，鸿鹄仙鸟之意象经归纳变化而成。

sentences.english: And I can tell that you are high flyers……
sentences.chinese: 我知道，你们都是鸿鹄，而非燕雀。

definition: (bird species of China) brambling (Fringilla montifringilla)/(fig.) small fry
lit. the giant Peng bird spreads its wings and begins to fly/displaying awesome power and momentum at the outset/to have the world at one's feet
to spread one's wings and soar (idiom)/to develop one's abilities freely
lit. can the sparrow and swallow know the will of the great swan? (idiom)/fig. how can we small fry predict the ambitions of the great?

definition: (bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
kun 鯤|鲲[kun1] and peng 鵬|鹏[Peng2], mythological beasts/peng, a gigantic bird transformed from the kun
the fabled roc flies ten thousand miles (idiom)/one's future prospects are brilliant
